snippet.title: Northgard | Clan of the Hounds | RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Northgard – The clan of the Hounds is out now!
The Sons of Ragnarök, as they have come to be known, are indeed as destructive as the event their past leader, Hvedrung, worked so hard to unleash. Freed from the gods' restrictions, they might indeed be the nightmare Northgard feared…
Buy now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2946220/Northgard__Garm_Clan_of_the_Hounds/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=media&utm_campaign=release&utm_content=post1
#Northgard #shirogames #RTS
---------------------------------
